item.title: Adih add a quote by Jeff Jarvis
item.description: "Writing in Library Journal, Ben Vershbow of the Institute for the Future of Book envisioned a digital ecology in which "parts of books will reference parts of other books. Books will be woven toghether out of components in remote databases and servers." Kevin Kelly wrote in The New York times Magagzine: "In the the new world of books, every bit informs another; every page reads all the other pages." -- Jeff Jarvis

item.title: Adih add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Adih add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Adih add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Adih add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Adih add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Adih add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Adih add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Adih add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Adih add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Adih add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Adih add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Adih add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Adih add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Adih add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Adih add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Adih add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Adih add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Adih add a quote by Nicolas Chamfort
item.description: "A day without laughter is a day wasted." -- Nicolas Chamfort

item.title: Adih add a quote by Confucious
item.description: "Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life." -- Confucious

item.title: Adih add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Adih add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Adih add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "The difference between genius and stupidity is; genius has its limits." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Adih add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Adih add a quote by Pablo Picasso
item.description: "Everything you can imagine is real." -- Pablo Picasso

item.title: Adih add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than You." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Adih add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Adih add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Adih add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Adih add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "I learned this, at least, by my experiment: that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours." -- Henry David Thoreau
